hints.content:
A sea turtle laid $\purpleD{39}$ eggs. $\blueE{11}$ eggs hatched on a Monday.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/b48a3211142d78c4d8e0b824419b741b11730909)

$\purpleD{39}-\blueE{11}=\maroonD{28}$

There were $\maroonD{28}$ eggs left.
$\goldE{22}$ sea turtle eggs hatched on a Wednesday.

question.content:
A sea turtle laid $39$ eggs on the beach.  $11$ eggs hatched on a Monday.  $6$ eggs hatched on a Tuesday.  The rest of the eggs hatched on a Wednesday.

**How many sea turtle eggs hatched on Wednesday?**  

[[☃ numeric-input 1]] eggs
